---
Song: ponmEni
Film: moondrAm piRai
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d2 n2 S

ponmEni uruhudhE
mp p p  rr r rp.

ennAsai peruhudhE
mp ppn  srr r r

yEdhEthO ninaivu thONudhE
srr  r   srr  r  sr r r

engEO idhayam pOgudhE
srr r  srr r   srr rp

panikkAtrilE
s r  m  p n

tharanA tharanA nananA
S  n p  n  p m  p m r

Stanza 1:
iLamai ithu yEngum vayadhu iru vizhiyum thoongAthu 
sp m   pm   p  n   p m mr  sp  m p  m   p    pn np

inimai sugam vAngum vayadhil iniyum ithu thAngAthu 
sp m   p m   p  n   p m mr   sp m   pm   p   pn np

iLamEni vAduthE thaNalAgavE 
sg p n  d m mr  s  g p n d

iLangAtru veesuthE analAgavE 
sg  p  n  d  m mr  sg p n d

bathilillaiyO
s r  m  p  pn

tharanA tharanA nananA
S  n p  n  p m  p m r

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
aruvi ena Asai ezhundhu aNaikkum sugam pArkkAthO
urugum manam unnai ninaindhu uNarvugaLai sErkkAdhO 
unakkAga yEnguthE oru poovudal 
uRavAdum inbamO thiruppARkkadal 
badhil illaiyO
tharanA tharanA nananA
